entry.title: Book Review: Fans First: Change the Game, Break the Rules & Create an Unforgettable Experience by Jesse Cole
entry.summary: In Fans First, Jesse Cole—founder of the Savannah Bananas baseball team and its signature yellow tuxedo—delivers more than a book; he delivers a manifesto on reimagining customer experience. entry.title: Bend MSA Adds Two Counties
entry.summary: by David Cooke and Nicole Ramos, State of Oregon Employment Department March 11, 2025 The Bend Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) is now three counties: Crook County, Deschutes County, and Jefferson County.
